sqlMap.select: SELECT A.API_ID APIID,A.API_NAME APINAME,A.API_METHOD APIMETHOD,D.DIR_NAME DIRNAME FROM API A,SERVICE B,DIR_SER_LIST C,DIRECTORY D WHERE A.SERVICE_ID=B.SERVICE_ID AND B.SERVICE_ID=C.SERVICE_ID AND C.DIR_ID=D.DIR_ID AND A.API_NAME like '%'||#value#||'%'
SELECT '联系我们,联系我们,联系我们,联系我们,联系我们,联系我们,联系我们,联系我们,联系我们,联系我们,联系我们,联系我们,联系我们,' contace FROM DUAL
